name: Random Rooms (itch)
description:
Meet Morris. He's quite a good kid that loves his girlfriend Sophie.
While they were having Netflix and chill at the park, the mysterious villain came and took her to his dungeon nearby. Though dungeon's got a reputation of place nobody's returning back from, Morris found his daddy's machinegun and gone deep into the dungeon.

A few rooms later he understood the thing - you can never expect where the next door leads you to.
There's no way home other than going through hordes of evil minions.

Also you can use your GameJolt account to access the highscore table!

Controls:
Arrows - Move/Choose menu items
Z - Shoot/Use menu item
X - Action
Escape - Pause

This game was made for GBJAM 4
